details: Designed and rolled out a custom Playwright MCP Server used org-wide to generate base automation scripts in minutes.
Built backend E2E generators covering full API surfaces, significantly reducing manual test effort.
Developed auto-regression analysis tooling to track failures and release trends.
Designed auto-SDK pipelines detecting Swagger changes and automatically updating multi-language SDKs.
Launched Slack automation apps to reduce manual intervention in support and operational workflows.
Regularly debugged Spring Boot and Node.js services to distinguish test vs product issues and unblock releases.
Acted as a quality architect influencing automation standards and test strategy across teams.
Automated manual operational workflows using Slack-based automation, reducing response times.
Optimized cloud costs via cron-based cleanup and governance, saving ~$1K+ per month.
Integrated cloud resources using Crossplane, enabling cloud-agnostic test execution across AWS, Azure, and GCP.
Implemented and enhanced Testkube with in-cluster testing, triggers, and reusable workflows.
Shifted validation to build-level execution, strengthening CI/CD pipelines and reducing late failures.
Designed Jenkins-based pipelines focused on early defect detection and fast feedback.
Mentored QA engineers to independently own complex automation systems and cloud tooling.
Led a team of 3 QA engineers and managed sprint planning and execution.
Built scalable automation frameworks using Java, JavaScript, Cypress, K6, and Selenide.
Integrated post-deployment automation using Spinnaker.
Implemented performance testing strategies for microservices and SQS-based systems.
Improved system reliability through proactive automation and performance insights.
Implemented frontend automation using Selenium (Java) and Selenide (Kotlin).
Built backend API automation using Kotlin and RestAssured.
Automated GraphQL APIs and maintained large-scale regression suites (~4K+ test cases).
Integrated Allure, ReportPortal, and Selenoid Grid for reporting and execution scalability.
Automated 100+ healthcare web applications across enterprise client engagements.
Executed E2E, regression, smoke, UAT, and UI testing.
Worked on US government projects with strict compliance and quality standards.
Built strong foundations in enterprise QA processes and documentation.
